title: Simple Present Sentence Creation
desc: Practice creating sentences using the simple present tense to describe daily routines and habits.
prompt_en: Create sentences in the simple present tense about your daily activities.
prompt_zh: 用簡單現在式造句，描述你的日常活動。
sample_questions: What do you usually eat for breakfast?
Describe your morning routine using simple present tense.
Write a sentence about what your best friend does every weekend.

title: Correct the Simple Present Errors
desc: Identify and correct errors in sentences that use the simple present tense incorrectly.
prompt_en: Find and fix the mistakes in the following simple present sentences.
prompt_zh: 找出並改正以下簡單現在式句子中的錯誤。
sample_questions: She go to school every day.

title: Simple Present Question and Answer
desc: Practice asking and answering questions using the simple present tense about habits and routines.
prompt_en: Ask and answer questions in the simple present tense about daily habits.
prompt_zh: 用簡單現在式練習問答，討論日常習慣。
sample_questions: What time do you usually wake up?

title: Fill in the Blanks with Simple Present
desc: Complete sentences by filling in the blanks with the correct form of the verb in simple present tense.
prompt_en: Fill in the blanks with the correct simple present form of the verbs.
prompt_zh: 用正確的簡單現在式動詞填空。

title: Describe Pictures Using Simple Present
desc: Look at pictures and describe what is happening using simple present tense sentences.
prompt_en: Describe the actions in the pictures using simple present tense.
prompt_zh: 看圖片並用簡單現在式描述正在發生的事情。
sample_questions: Describe what the boy is doing in the picture.
What do the people usually do in this scene?
Explain the daily routine shown in the image.
